item.title: ‘Choice’ Cannot Coexist with Abortion Coercion
item.description: The abortion industry has enabled coercion and abuse and is willing to sacrifice women’s ‘choice’ on the altar of abortion access and increased profit...

item.title: The Government Shouldn’t Get into the Chip Business
item.description: It would be a bad idea for the Trump administration to take a stake in Intel.

item.title: How the U.S. Can Make the Most of a Defense-Spending Boom
item.description: The choice is clear: modernize and lead — or remain the arsenal of bureaucracy.

item.title: Israel Isn’t a Danger to Jews — Jew Haters Are
item.description: The idea that Israel’s actions are putting Jews at risk globally is a contemptible position that would never be applied to any other minority group.

item.title: Who Knew Sheboygan Is an Art Mecca?
item.description: Wisconsin’s Kohler Arts Center does ingenuity with both sparkle and substance.
